title: 01/22/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/22/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, we learn of the passing of the great Hank Aaron. DP reflects on Hammerin' Hank's legacy. HoFer Johnny Bench calls in to remember his friend. We're also joined by new Chargers Head Coach Brandon Staley. His explains why he defensive mindset will help Justin Herbert. Plus, Tag Team calls in to discuss their hit song "Whoomp there it is."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
